Articles.Content:
**please don't turn this into a sexist discussion**

I have nothing against women astronauts, i just prefer only the original kerbals in the game

thanks in advance
This sounds like it might be a modding question so I moved it to the proper section

I'm pretty sure it's not possible to remove them outright. You could try doing something with [Texture Replacer](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107471-1-0-TextureReplacer-2-4-%2828-4-2015%29-updated-for-1-0-legacyFemales-option) mod though.

> 
> I'm pretty sure it's not possible to remove them outright. You could try doing something with [Texture Replacer](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107471-1-0-TextureReplacer-2-4-%2828-4-2015%29-updated-for-1-0-legacyFemales-option) mod though.

Thats not really possible either because they have different models so you would end up with a transexual kerbal.

Actually, the texturereplacer mod has a 'forceLegacyFemales' which makes the female kerbals use male models, but female textures. I suppose with some fiddling around, the OP can achieve what they want.

You could only hire males. The pool of recruits refreshes on occasion.

Also, you could do a search and replace on your persistent.sfs file. Search for gender = Female and change it to gender = Male

They'll still have feminine sounding names but you can either change those as well or embrace it as truely neutral to gender. If Kerbals are androgynous, they should not consider Valentina (for example) to be any more feminine than they'd consider Bob to be masculine.

Also, I think the females look less female than the males do male. I'd suggest trying out making them all female in game. Might look more androgynous.

> Also, I think the females look less female than the males do male. I'd suggest trying out making them all female in game. Might look more androgynous.

And then, someone made a mod that adds huge boobs to female kerbals.

\*facepalm\*

> 
> And then, someone made a mod that adds huge boobs to female kerbals.
> \*facepalm\*

Seriously? Lol
My own Kerbal Renamer can do that. It can also give you an all-female space program, or any random percentage of genders.
"Volunteer" them on missions Where No Kerbal Returns?

> 
> "Volunteer" them on missions Where No Kerbal Returns?

Exploration of the sun's surface? Checking for air currents in Jool's atmosphere? Only the bravest kerbals may apply!

> 
> Exploration of the sun's surface? Checking for air currents in Jool's atmosphere? Only the bravest kerbals may apply!

How about "re-entry without hacking the heatshield's config files?" ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> "Volunteer" them on missions Where No Kerbal Returns?

That's too much work for WMJWs.

> 
> That's too much work for WMJWs.

Weeklong Manually Jolting Warehouses?
well.. just why?

> 
> well.. just why?

Would you be saying the same thing if the thread was asking how to disable male kerbals instead? You have no right to judge how someone else wants to play their game.

> 
> Would you be saying the same thing if the thread was asking how to disable male kerbals instead? You have no right to judge how someone else wants to play their game.

> 
> And then, someone made a mod that adds huge boobs to female kerbals.
> \*facepalm\*

can you link me with that? I once got in trouble for suggesting such a thing, now actually having it would be like divine retribution.

I meant that as a semi-sarcastic but not inflammatory comment on the females look like males comment. I have no idea whether or not such a mod exists, but I'm damn sure (taking into account the plethora of adult themed skyrim mods, for example) that it will be made. Rule 34b.
Thread locked in 5.. 4... 3...

> 
> I meant that as a semi-sarcastic but not inflammatory comment on the females look like males comment. I have no idea whether or not such a mod exists, but I'm damn sure (taking into account the plethora of adult themed skyrim mods, for example) that it will be made. Rule 34b.

Just wait for someone to make a mod that invokes Rule 63. (Male <===> Female model switch)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-01T23:12:23Z" title="05/01/2015 11:12  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 1, 2015</time> by almagnus1**
I see what you did there.

![pqbyDvs.png](http://imgur.com/pqbyDvs.png)

That's a female Kerbal from something I drew two years ago. If there was a mod that made female Kerbals look like that (as in, sensibly sized ones, not gag boobs), I'd install it.
People please stay on topic. The OP asked a question, their motives are immaterial in this discussion.

> 
> **please don't turn this into a sexist discussion**
> I have nothing against women astronauts, i just prefer only the original kerbals in the game
> 
> thanks in advance

If that's true, the simplest solution applies.

Just don't use them.
